abstract.t: This Internet-Draft provides the description of problems faced by NFSand its various side band protocols, when implemented over IPv6 invarious deployment scenarios. Solutions to the various problems arealso given in the draft and are sought for approval.ForewordThis "forward" section is an unnumbered section that is not includedin the table of contents. It is primarily used for the IESG to makecomments about the document. It can also be used for comments aboutthe status of the document and sometimes is used for the RFC2119requirements language statement.
